channel.title: RealismScape 719 - Runescape, made better
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]RealismScape 719 BETA - Runescape, made better.[/b][/size]
[size=12pt][b]WE ARE OFFERING FREE MODERATOR TO THE FIRST TEN PEOPLE FREE DONATOR FOR THE NEXT 20 PEOPLE FREE FULL TORVA FOR THE NEXT 50 PEOPLE[/b][/size]
Downloadable Client: [url=http://bit.ly/1jG10Bv]http://bit.ly/1jG10Bv[/url] Website: [url=http://realismscape.eu.pn]http://realismscape.eu.pn[/url]
[i]RealismScape is a work-in-progress 719 server available for thousands of players to play as a BETA. We average about 30+ people on daily as of March 25th, 2014.[/i]
[b][size=12pt]Features[/size][/b]
[ul] Fully functional special attacks on all weapons No members-only items Perfect switching Full Duel Arena Wilderness PvP Bounty Hunter PvM Pest Control Castle Wars Working Grand Exchange Custom items 99% of items fully functional All bosses in the correct areas Custom monsters/bosses 50+ Quests 30+ People daily 10+ New players daily Automatic price changes Auto-correcting economy No item limit No bank slot limit Bank auto-organization In-game price checks No lag 99.9% Uptime Anti-dupe Barrows Trained and hard working staff Clan wars (Safe + Dangerous) Daily updates 12 Worlds and counting Dicing Clue Scrolls God Wars Dungeon Economy/Spawn worlds All skills fully functional Max combat 138 Nomad Soul Wars[/ul]
[b]More to come![/b]
